title: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When highlighting two lines of text that contain a mix of spaces and tabs, and then executing the ShiftLeft command, nothing happens.
EB: The ShiftLeft command should properly indent the selected lines of text, regardless of the presence of mixed tabs and spaces.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type the following: 
   <space>
   <tab>some text
   <tab>some text2
3. Highlight the two lines above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft command.
